price: Kandi uwo duhaye kuramba, tumusubiza inyuma mu miremekere (agasubira ibwana). Ese nta bwenge bagira?
arabic: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waman nuʿammir'hu nunakkis'hu fī al-khalqi afalā yaʿqilūna
